data.title: obituary – Port Isabel
data.text:
Services for Carlos Uresti, Sr., 68, of Killeen, were held at 10 a.m. Tuesday at St. Joseph Catholic Church. Burial with full military honors followed at Central Texas State Veterans Cemetery. Mr. Uresti died June 17, 2014, at his home, surrounded by his family. He was born Nov. 4 1945, in Port Isabel to …

Continue reading

Olivia Luna Moore, 51, of San Benito, Texas, entered into rest on June 25, 2014. She was preceded in death by her mother, Dima Gonzales Luna. Surviving her is her loving husband of 19 years, Roy Moore; her father, Santiago Luna; three sisters: Irene Luna, Sylvia Luna, and Estella Luna; three brothers: Roberto Luna, Raul …

Continue reading

Roberto Castillo, 57, entered into rest on Monday, June 23, 2014. He is preceded in death by his parents, Teodosio and Dorina Castillo; and a brother, Ruben Castillo. He is survived by his sons, Robert Eastman Castillo, Robert Castillo, Gilbert Castillo, Roberto Carlos Castillo, and Sergio Alejandro Perez; daughters, Jordan Castillo and Veronica Dorina Castillo; …

Macchiaverna, O. P. (Mac)Born in Elizabeth, New Jersey January 2, 1920 following a very long illness passed away June 14,2014 at the age of 94. Preceded in death by two sons, Paul Macchiaverna, Garden Ridge, CA and Bruce Macchiaverna, Austin, Texas. Survived by wife Wanda Macchiaverna, two stepsons, Michael Caballero and wife Linda, Chris Caballero …

Tranquilino C.Torres, 78, of Albuquerque, NM entered into eternal rest on Saturday June 7, 2014. Tranquilino was born in Port Isabel, Texas on May 22, 1936 to Tranquilino Torres, Sr. and Francisca C. Torres. Funeral services will be held at 10 a.m., Saturday, July 5, 2014 at Our Lady Star of the Sea Catholic Church in Port …

Bianca Marie Mire-Sutton, 31, of Port Isabel, Texas, passed away on May 24, 2014. She was preceded in death by her paternal grandparents and maternal grandparents. Surviving her is her daughter, Mia Rae Sutton; her parents: Clement (Elaine) Mire and Denise Jones; three sisters: Patty Miller, Noel Mire, and Erika Mire; and a niece, Meagan …

Becky Haugh, 59, passed away on Tuesday, April 29th, 2014 in Texas. She was a graduate of Mt. Pleasant High School. Becky loved her life as a nurse and we will all miss her loving spirit and kindness. She is survived by her parents, Max and Marie Fielding and her loving husband, Tom …

Continue reading

Belinda Garza, 49, of Port Isabel, Texas, entered into eternal peace on Tuesday, May 6, 2014 at Valley Regional Medical Center in Brownsville, TX. Belinda was a lifetime resident of Port Isabel, TX. She was a member of Our Lady Star of the Sea Catholic Church and employed with H.E.B. as an Administrative Assistant for …

Continue reading

Overnight last week on Tuesday, in a peaceful sleep, Peggy Lynn Thobe went to be with her LORD AND SAVIOR JESUS CHRIST. Over the last 30 years she had nurtured hundreds of elementary students as the music teacher at Derry Elementary School in Port Isabel, Texas. For all of those many years she devoted herself to …

Continue reading

Jose Alberto “Pellejos” Barrera, 79, of Port Isabel/Los Fresnos, Texas, entered into rest on April 24, 2014. Jose worked as a bait fisherman in the Laguna Madre area and at Jim’s Pier filleting fish on South Padre Island for many years. He was preceded in death by his parents, Jose Luis and Micaela Martinez Barrera; …
